Synopsis:
 
Blockbuster about the life of Jesus of Nazareth, which was a large and well-known cast that highlights Max von Sydow as Jesus Christ. From the Gospels about the life of Jesus in occupied Palestine by Rome: his birth in Bethlehem, his childhood in Nazareth, the three years of public life, the Last Supper, the betrayal by his disciple Judas, his trial, crucifixion and subsequent resurrection.
